samples.ui
Class Choice

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.Choice

public class Choice
extends Component

This class implements a user interface toggle class that can be in either an on or off state.. An Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED or Event.ITEM_DESELECTED is propagated as the Choice object state is toggled by key press events.

Choice

public Choice(javax.microedition.lcdui.Image offImage,
              javax.microedition.lcdui.Image onImage,
              java.lang.Object label)
Create a new Choice instance.

Parameters:
offImage - The Image to use for dislaying the off state.
onImage - The Image to use for dislaying the on state.
label - The Image or String to display as a label.
Method Detail

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action.

Overrides:
keyPressed in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The Choice class handles actions of type Canvas.FIRE and notifies registered event listeners of an Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED or Event.ITEM_DESELECTED as the state is toggled.
key - The key pressed.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.
